DOC.brief_summary: A prospective cross-over randomize study aim test hypothesis local injury endometrium increase implantation rate successive cycle . Seventy IVF patient randomly select undergo either endometrial biopsy minimal cervical scratch day 8-10 21-23 cycle , precede IVF treatment . If pregnant , woman continue another IVF cycle , precede endometrial cervical scratch complimentary procedure first cycle . The main major outcome include pregnancy rate , implantation rate , endometrial thickness , abortion rate , live birth embryo quality .
DOC.criteria: Women undergo IVF treatment Repeated Implantation failure PID suspect PID Undiagnosed Irregular Bleeding
